HEADER.Title: Build Java arguments using specified array.

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = "" :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&UC4RB_AZR_ARG_VALUES#[],SIZE) :SET &IDX# = 1 :WHILE &IDX# LE &LEN# : SET &TEMP# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_AZR_ARG_VALUES#[&IDX#],"""","\""")
! Concatinate Java argument : SET &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[&IDX#])
! concatinate argument value : SET &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " "" ") : SET &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, &TEMP#) : SET &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " "" ") :SET &IDX# = &IDX# + 1 :ENDWHILE
